訵字的基本解释

訵
chī
暗中窥察。

訵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chī］
［《廣韻》丑飢切，平脂，徹。］
(1)暗中察知。见《集韵·平脂》。
(2)作人名用字。《宋史·宗室世系表三》有赵与訵。

訵字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　訵； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1152第14
【廣韻】丑飢切【集韻】抽遲切，?音絺。【字林】隂知也。【類篇】伺察也。　又人名。崇訵，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【玉篇】【廣韻】丑利切【集韻】丑二切，?絺去聲。義同。【廣韻】亦作呬。【類篇】又與䜉同。

訵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
訵字的起名意思

暂无。

Woodcutter
Basic explanation of words
Woodcutter
chī
Secretly spied.
Woodcutter
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chī］
["Guangyun" is ugly and hungry, flat fat and thorough. ]
(1) Secretly detect and know. See "Jiyun·Pingzhi".
(2) Use words for names. "Song History · Clan Lineage Table III" has Zhao and Woodcutter.
Woodcutter
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　訵; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1152 14
[Guang Yun] Ugly hungry cut [Ji Yun] Pumping late cut,? Yin 絺. [Word Lin] Yin knows too. [Classes] Serve and observe.　Another name. Chongzi, see [Song History·Clan List].　 [Yu Pian] [Guang Yun] Chou Liqie [Ji Yun] Ugly two cuts,? 絺去声. The same meaning. [Guang Yun] also made 呬. 【Classes】It's the same with you again.
